item.title: How to Deploy
item.description:
*Warning: this is a work in progress, and the process isn’t complete.

How to deploy

These instructions only apply to the static Hugo website that powers the majority of the content on www.antif4.com and is served via an nginx instance runnin gon a VPS.

Step 1. Generate a deploy package

Deploy packages are stored in ./deploy and are checked into the repo. To create a new deploy package run:

npm run deploy

item.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
item.description:
antif4.com

What is antif4.com?

antif4.com is a sincere, fundamentally human, online community.

We are focused on building safe, durable online communities that deeply value diversity and mtually supporting one another. We believe that online communities can fundamentally promote social wellness without the associated negatives we see in social media today, impacting everyone.

We believe the world, and by extension the online world, is not safe. We believe there are two primary forces endangering people online: capitalism and fascism.
